name: I seriously can't win with anything rn
author: stealth sub

notes.text:
>spend 6 days grinding with dinos, magnets, etc
>get frustrated
>forget it, we dark magician for memes now
>don't lose
>brick once
>besides that
>never lose
>meme my way into KOG
>dark magic attack

people shouldn't have dropped sergeant electro, electro + floodgate + mirror wall is still secure af for locking down the field and waiting to draw a combo
